name: Reset and Reloaded
description:
A minimalist  satisfying top-down shooter with fun little twist mechanics.

Submission for Blackthornprod Game Jam #3 2021.

All code, art, sound, music and design were developed during the jam, only font was used (see credits).

The game follows the theme of "Less is More" in multiple ways from the core game mechanics to the simple design by subtraction art style. Core mechanics better explained in the in-game "How to Play".

Thank you for playing this game. Hope you enjoyed. Feedback is always appreciated.
